Question: MacDonald also praised this person's "coruscating pseudo-Indian" guitar solo on "Good Morning Good Morning".
Hints: Best known for primarily using a plectrum or pick, this person occasionally plays fingerstyle.
[this person] thinking in terms of both rhythm and 'lead bass' ..
On 10 April 1970, in the midst of business disagreements with his bandmates, this person announced his departure from the group.
